ComicInfo.Title: Silent Cathedrals, Epilogue: Resurrection
ComicInfo.Summary: Part 6 of the 6-part 'Silent Cathedrals.' Back from his sojourn in the bizarre Garden of Spires, Xombi returns to his laboratory in a desperate attempt to resurrect Kelly Sanborne, whom he inadvertently killed when he first got his regenerative powers.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-11 20:53:10. [CVDB39955] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 04:40:13. [Issue ID 56027]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Brozowski,J. J. Birch,J. J. Birch
ComicInfo.Inker: Joe Brozowski,J. J. Birch,J. J. Birch
ComicInfo.Colorist: Andrew Burrell,Noelle Giddings,Noelle C. Giddings,Noelle C. Giddings,Andrew Burrell
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
